- The Airports Authority of India (AAI) has published the AAI Junior Executive Syllabus 2025 on their Official Website

Title: RRB ALP CEN 01/2025 Notification
Summary:
- RRB ALP CEN 01/2025 Notification: The Railway Recruitment Boards (RRBs), under the Ministry of Railways, Government of India, have announced the Centralized Employment Notice (CEN) No
- 01/2025 for the recruitment of Assistant Loco Pilots (ALP)
- The RRB ALP Recruitment 2025 Notification was released on March 29, 2025, with online applications opening from April 12, 2025, to May 19, 2025

- WB Polytechnic Admission 2025 : The West Bengal State Council of Technical and Vocational Education and Skill Development (WBSCTVESD) has released the notification for WB Polytechnic Admission 2025
- Aspiring candidates can apply for 3-year diploma courses in Engineering & Technology for first-year entry, and 2-year diploma courses for lateral (second-year) entry across various disciplines
- This admission process covers government, government-sponsored, and self-financed polytechnic institutions across West Bengal

- The Indian National Biology Olympiad (INBO) is a big national-level exam for school students who love biology
- It helps students show their knowledge and gives them a chance to represent India in the International Biology Olympiad (IBO) – a very prestigious global competition
- If you’re thinking about taking part in INBO 2024-25, it’s important to understand the rules, syllabus, and exam format

- JIPMAT Answer Key 2025 : The National Testing Agency (NTA) has officially released the JIPMAT 2025 Provisional Answer Key for the Joint Integrated Programme in Management Admission Test (JIPMAT) held on April 26, 2025
- Candidates who appeared for this national-level management entrance exam can now check the provisional answer keys, their recorded responses, and the official question paper on the NTA’s JIPMAT website –  exams
- nta

- SJVN Executive Trainee Recruitment 2025 : Satluj Jal Vidyut Nigam (SJVN) has announced 114 Executive Trainee job openings
- Candidates who are interested and meet the eligibility criteria can apply online on the official SJVN website
- The last date to submit the application form is 18th May 2025

- If you are waiting for the JKSET Cut Off Marks 2025, then your wait is almost over
- The University of Jammu will soon release it online
- So, candidates should keep checking the official JKSET website regularly

- The Gujarat Public Service Commission (GPSC) has officially released the  GPSC Answer Key 2025  for the Class 1 and 2 Preliminary Examination
- Candidates who appeared for the exam held on 20 April 2025 can now download the provisional answer key from the official website — gpsc
- gujarat

- RITES Ltd Recruitment 2025 : RITES Ltd, a Government of India enterprise under the Ministry of Railways, has released a new notification for hiring experienced professionals
- The  RITES Ltd Senior Resident Engineer/ S&T, Design Engineer/Civil, and Other Recruitment 2025  is now open for multiple posts across engineering disciplines
- This recruitment will be done through walk-in interviews for various project sites in Delhi NCR and Gurgaon

Title: IAF Air Force Agniveer 01/2026 Result
Summary:
- Air Force Agniveer Notification: The Indian Air Force (IAF) invites online applications from unmarried Indian male and female candidates for the Agniveer Vayu Intake 01/2026 under the Agnipath Scheme
- Eligible and interested candidates can apply online through the official website from 07 January 2024 to 27 January 2024
- If you are interested in applying for the Indian Air Force Agniveer Vayu Posts, make sure you fulfill the requirements
